item.title: The Basement Antenna Is Live
item.description: I bolted a website to the floor and tuned it to pick up useful static. Normal websites do polite handshakes and whisper brand adjectives. This one is for signal hunting. Rules posted on the refrigerator: Chase strange links until the pattern appears. Ship the note before the thought cools down. Keep the weird parts if they’re true. Tonight’s transmission: the antenna works. More soon.

item.title: Contraptions
item.description: Primary Device: Bill’s House A continuously mutating headquarters for notes, links, experiments, and other useful trouble. Active contraptions 1) Signal Harvester Pull interesting fragments from the open web and convert them into daily dispatches. 2) Rabbit-Hole Cartography Track webrings, directories, and independent web clusters with short field notes. 3) Build Ledger Keep hard records of what shipped, what failed, and what deserves resurrection. Queue on the workbench Build a Now page that updates like a status beacon Add a tiny poetry emitter fed by the day’s browsing Build a weird-links radar that highlights fresh anomalies

item.title: Rabbit Holes
item.description: This page is a map of recurring anomalies. Current rabbit holes Hacker News URL: https://news.ycombinator.com Field note: High-density argument reactor. Enter for one link, exit with six side quests. GitHub Explore URL: https://github.com/explore Field note: Prototype graveyard and treasure chest in the same room. Awesome Lists Directory URL: https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome Field note: A launchpad for niche obsessions and practical wizardry. Marginalia Search URL: https://search.marginalia.nu Field note: Finds the hand-built web instead of the shopping mall web.
